name: Corner Checkers
description:
Corner Checkers, also known as 'Ugolki' - the popular board game that you can play with your friends or against challenging computer opponent.

The goal of the game is to transfer your pieces from your own corner to the opposing corner. On each turn, a player either moves a single piece to an adjacent open square, or jumps over one or more pieces in sequence.

Features:
* Exclusive user interface and great sound effects
* Single player and two players game - play with your friends or against artificial intelligence engine
* Different levels of difficulty
* Auto-difficulty - game engine tracks your playing skills and adapts game difficulty exactly for you
* Move undo function that allows you multiple retries and workout of your checker standing
* Automatic save when you exit game or receive a phone call
* iPhone, iPad and iPod touch support
* Portrait and also landscape mode for your convenience
* No Ads
